name: Digibonus
tag_list: advertising, lead-generation, contests, sweepstakes, instant-win, community-managment, engagement, facebook, social-media-marketing
overview:
Digibonus has been helping brands build strong relationships with their fans since 2009 through engaging social media experiences such as polls, prize draws, photo contests, quizzes and more. A pioneer in online marketing campaigns, we offer one of the most sophisticated and yet simple-to-use platforms on the market, with a suite of consulting and implementation services designed to make life easier for our customers. Our motto, â€˜Love your fansâ€™, reflects how the worldâ€™s most forward-thinking brands approach social media, putting communities back at the heart of their business. We love being part of it!

Digibonus has delivered campaigns in 18 languages for more than 100 customers in 20 countries. Our customers include media organizations like Canal +, Fun Radio, MTV, Metro and RTL, consumer brands such as Ferrero, Nestle, L’Oreal, Toshiba, Total and Samsung, small-medium businesses such as Ecole Superieure de Commerce de La Rochelle and Servcorp, and e-commerce players like eboutic, Mr Good Deal and Resulteo.

Founded by Gilles Babinet, Jean-Marc Holder and Jeremie Wainstain, our company has expanded with seasoned experts in marketing and technology, as well as an experienced board. (More about our team here.) The company is headquartered in Paris, France, and has a research and development centre in Belgrade, Serbia.

Digibonus received initial funding from Alven Capital and Ile-de-France DÃ©veloppement. The company is both a â€˜Jeune Entreprise Innovanteâ€™ (status granted to innovative start-ups) and a recipient of OSEO/ANVAR research grants awarded to companies developing innovative technologies.
